scripts.prepare: mustache configs/${NETWORK:-rinkeby}.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache configs/${NETWORK:-rinkeby}.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-test: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/promm-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-bsc-test: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/promm-bsc-testnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-ropsten: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/promm-ropsten --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
